name: Notifications not over Outliner
short_description:
Simple mod that moves the notification area next to the outliner instead of on top.

I've tested this mod with 80% GUI scaling at 1920x1080 resolution. With certain combinations of resolution/UI scale the notifications area overlaps with the lens tool. If that is the case for you try out the compatibility version of this mod: [url=steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2886957094]Notifications not over Outliner (compatibility version)[/url]

Compatible with [url=steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2884035975]"More Spreadsheets"[/url] (thanks to inch4tk for the help). Load this mod after "More Spreadsheets".

Compatible with [url=steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2883625242]"Notifications Filter"[/url].
